title: shrI rAmacandra
sahitya:
(rAgA:  shankarAbharaNa)   


anupallavi



shrI rAmacandra.  rAgamAlikA.  Adi tALA.
1:  shrI rAmacandra pAdAbjE yanamanO madhupAyitam svadharma niratO yastu nisprhO yO dvijOttamaha
 caraNam 2  			(rAgA:  bhairavi)Aa:S R2 G2 M1 P D2 N2 S  Av:  S N2 D1 P M1 G2 R2 S  yaha kIrtnAni svIyni bhAa rAgayutAni ca gAyannirantaram bhaktyA prINayAmAsa rAghavam
  caraNam 3  			(rAgA:  simhEndrmadhyam)  nAradAnugrAhAdyastu lEbhE su-jnAna sampadam yatkIrtana rasAsvAdamAdriyantE budhAssadA
 caraNam 4  			(rAgA:  khamAs)Aa:S M1 G3 M1 P D2 N2 S  Av:  S N2 D2 P M1 G3 R2 S  sItA lakSmaNa shtrughna bharatAni lasUnubhihi sEvitam rAmamAlOkya janma sAphalyamAptavAnam
 caraNam 5  			(rAgA:  mOhana)Aa:S R2 G3 P D2 S  Av:  S D2 P G3 R2 S  kIrtikAyEna yO bhAti tyAgarAjO gururmahAn tam stuvImO vayam nityam rAma bhakta shirOmaNim
 caraNam 6  			(rAgA:  madhyamAvati)Aa:S R2 M1 P N2 S  Av:  S N2 P M1 R2 S  shrI tyAgarAja caritam sadA sarvajana priyam vAsudEvasya krpayA vAsudEvEna varNitam
